name: Under New Management
description: The Orion Syndicate of the future and the Terran Empire of the present may have parted ways, but they left behind a powerful ship: the Viridian. Can you stop Mirror Culber and Mirror Scotty's slaving operation?
rules:
-- In a Skirmish Event, you will engage in space battles against thematically appropriate foes until the Event's conclusion.
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- Unique Ship Battle Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Culber, Scotty, Orion Slaver, Mirror Crew or matching a Battle Trait will provide a bonus.
-- Using the I.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701, Harrad-Sar's Barge or the Terran Empire Constellation Class will provide a bonus to hull.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Culber, Scotty, Orion Slaver or Mirror

featured_crew.name: Spock
featured_crew.flavor: After undergoing the Fal-tor-pan ceremony, a revived Spock begins to put his fragmented memory back together.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Scotty
rewards.flavor: An ingenious engineer of Scottish descent who never failed to pull Captain Kirk and the U.S.S. Enterprise out of danger.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

ship.name: Terran Empire Constellation Class
ship.flavor: The Constellation Class was a Terran Empire Battle Cruiser that entered service in the late 23rd century.

rewards.flavor: An ingenious engineer of Scottish descent who never failed to pull Captain Kirk and the U.S.S. Enterprise out of danger.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

ship.name: I.S.S. Enterprise NCC-1701
ship.flavor: A Constitution-class vessel made legend under the command of Captain Kirk. A hardy ship that survived many encounters.

ship.name: Harrad-Sar's Barge
ship.flavor: While pretending to command a mining vessel, Harrad-Sar launched an operation to seize control of the Enterprise and deliver it into Orion hands.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Spock
rewards.flavor: After undergoing the Fal-tor-pan ceremony, a revived Spock begins to put his fragmented memory back together.

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Spock
rewards.flavor: After undergoing the Fal-tor-pan ceremony, a revived Spock begins to put his fragmented memory back together.

rewards.name: Rarity Constellation
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.
